title: Machu Picchu, Peru
des: Located high in the Andes mountains of Peru.

title: The Grand Canyon, Arizona
des: This incredible natural wonder is in the U.S. state of Arizona.

title: Rome, Italy
des: The Eternal City is more like a giant, living museum.

title: Maui, Hawaii
des: This Hawaiian island offers a wide range of experiences for visitors.

title: Masai Mara, Kenya
des: Kenya's Masai Mara is an incredible bio-diverse area and a popular safari destination.

title: Montreal, Canada
des: As you listen to the sound of French being spoken around you and explore Old Montreal.

title: New Zealand
des: With its striking natural beauty, friendly citizens, and recent popularity due to its use as the filming location for the Lord of the Ring.

title: Istanbul, Turkey
des: Turkey's capital city is another destination that offers a great mix of culture, food, and history.

title: Angkor Wat, Cambodia
des: Located just outside the Cambodian city of Siem Reap, Angkor Wat is the largest religious site in the world.
